website_summaries.verdict: More than a milkshake, this machine is equipped to blend almost anything.
pros: With a commercial-grade motor, it can blend a multitude of milkshake ingredients as well as other creations
cons: Motor suddenly stopped for some users

customer_reviews.title: I have loved using it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews, but I received this in January. I have loved using it, the performance is everything it said. I’ve used it probably two to three times a week for smoothies and today, April 1, the motor stopped and it’s done - dead - inoperable. Very disappointing purchase for an Amazon recommended purchase. I just missed the return window by 2 weeks. I would not recommend purchase of this blender.
customer_reviews.author: J N

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than a vitamix
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious 1500 watt blender. Some of the bad reviews were written by people who have no idea how to make a proper smoothie. If you do it wrong, the motor will overheat. The same rules apply with any high speed blender. Learn how to avoid cavitation and overload and your smoothies will be perfect every time. After dozens of smoothies and a few “multiple smoothie” parties, I’ve never overheated the motor.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Homer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and simple
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and simple to use. We've been using this 1-2 times a week for a few weeks now to make coconut milk. Finding coconut milk that is just water and coconut for ingredients was expensive and difficult. The soup function took the process from several hours of simmering and then using a crappy "normal blender" and hoping for the best to a 1 hour soak in the water then flip a switch and walk away. 6 minutes later the coconut milk is done blending and too hot to squeeze through a nut milk bag. The coconut is shredded so fine that it works as flour after straining with the bag and getting a bit of drying time.
customer_reviews.author: Girard Jergensen

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks!! I only used it 4 times and already the motor has blown on it. Horrible!! Do NOT make the same mistake. This manufacturer needs to fix their defective motor and base. Very cheap features for the price. Very disappointed and will NOT purchase from this maker/seller again.
customer_reviews.author: HaShem's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. I've purchased two, and they both failed in exactly the same way after less than six months of use. I used the product to make smoothies just about every day. I followed the instructions for slowly adding ingredients, including frozen fruit. In both machines the blade housing 'stripped' and stopped working. I thought the first time might have been user error, so I purchased another one. Nope, same issue three months later with blender #2.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard?  MOtor stopped working after three months of moderate use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this very much until it stopped working. Smell of motor oil then wouldn’t start.
customer_reviews.author: R. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this thinking that it is good quality and durable but upon the first use the blender literally died. It just stopped working. Not sure if it was the fuse or something else. It just will not turn on. So we had to get a replacement. I understand sometimes there are defects but this is the first for us. As soon as we turn on the blender, it only worked for couple minutes and died.
customer_reviews.author: Chris swan

customer_reviews.title: Love love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this blender! I've always wanted a Vitamix, but could not afford one. My sister has a Vitamix and I loved hers for all great features. I will say this one is very similar to Vitamix, but NO its better! I love the cool features of making soup, crushing through spinach & kale & the easiness of cleaning. I am so glad I purchased this blender for half the cost of the Vitamix because this blender can do everything the Vitamix does if not better & a lot less noisier!
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Mostly used for smoothies. I like to use frozen fruit, spinach and fresh ginger with water. I’ve also made almond milk and soup amongst other things. Nut butter can be tricky to get out around blades, but it does a great job. I haven’t got the hang of chopping as everything gets puréed so fast. Maybe I just need more practice. Great customer support too. I’ve had my blender for nearly two years. When I was having a problem with bearings in pitcher I contacted Cosori customer support (on Amazon order details) and sent email with screenshots of order details and pics of issue and they issued replacement all in the same day. Very impressed and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make a smoothie immediately after training on their blender I smell smoke the blender automatically turned off with it being on three seconds there is maybe something wrong with the motor. I am immediately returning the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop your deciding and BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. BUY THIS BLENDER! I am so happy that I decided to take the leap. Since I purchased this, I have been making multiple smoothies per day. It is amazing at blending- especially for green smoothies. It completely chops up your greens. Swoon! I haven’t used the soup feature yet, but will edit once I do. Secondly, I would like to say the only thing I’m not completely thrilled about is that the feet aren’t even so I have to hold it steady at times. Overall, I am so happy with this purchase. I was also offered an extended warranty which was amazing. You will not regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Coding Anglophile

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Had some minor issues getting it to turn on occasionally. Just need to turn the speed dial to the lowest setting before switching to on. Other than that, an excellent blender. Seems to be at least as powerful as a Vitamix, but at a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST blender I have EVER owned!
customer_reviews.text: This blender will NOT even TURN ON most of the time. It has so much "safety crap" on it that it will not work. Your mileage may vary, but I will NEVER buy another product from this company. This thing has been a constant source of aggravation and waste for our family. How would you like to have a fully loaded blender with Almond Milk, fruit, veggie protein powder and other stuff...only to have it just SIT there because the machine will NOT turn on?! It BEEPS at you...but will it turn on more than 20% of time? NOPE. Never again, COSORI...never again.
customer_reviews.author: MaineReason

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!!
customer_reviews.text: we like our cosori blender. It is great for making frozen drinks and smoothies. also we have made creamy soups.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blender
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blender. I'm quite sure one could use it to pulverize a '54 Buick with no problem. I make smoothies with mixed berries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries and nary a single little seed is left. I would have awarded 4.5 stars if I could. The only negative is that it's almost impossible to scoop all the smoothie out because of the shape of the carafe. I realize that shape is what makes it work so well and that's the important part. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No chuncks it's always nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BOMB! I really did not want to spend $400 on a Vitamix. I njust couldn't justify spending that amount! So i did some research and bought this one and it is FABULOUS! Everything get exceptionally smooth! No chuncks it's always nice and smooth! I'm very pleaseqith my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Harris-Gates

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance! I’m so glad I gave this brand a try after reading the reviews. It’s so much better than my previous Vitamix or kitchen aid. It’s very powerful and not too noisy. I make smoothies daily and I’m super happy that it does the work pretty well, it shreds ice and fruit or veggies very well!
customer_reviews.author: PPSL

customer_reviews.title: Will you provide a replacement?
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: less than 1 yr after I bought it, it stopped working. For over a year I've been meaning to write a review or to see if they would replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I've never owned a blendtec or a vitamix as I could never justify the cost of it so I can't very well compare this blender to those but I LOVE this thing and can't imagine that those high end brands could do anything that this blender can't do. I primarily use it to make smoothie bowls and homemade sorbet. This thing can blend frozen fruit into a silky smooth puree with only a tiny dash of liquid. You can make nut butters, soups, blended drinks, and pretty much anything else you can imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Looks Aren’t Everything
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful and simple to use machine. At first glance, it seemed sturdy/well made. However, in less than 3 months the machine broke while mixing a smoothie with 1 frozen banana.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Blender never worked properly and completely failed within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Research showed this as a great product. It was not. It never turned on and off properly and completely failed within 2 months. Huge waste of money. When it would turn on, it did work well.
customer_reviews.author: T62

customer_reviews.title: Cosori beats Nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: So far I am delighted with the Cosori blender especially having had three nutribullets that bit the dust. It was much more expensive than the Nutribullet but does so much more. It arrived earlier than expected and does everything as advertised. It is way quieter than any blender I have ever owned. It is taller than all previous blenders I have owned and does not fit under my kitchen cabinets but found the perfect place for it on my counter near a window and an electric outlet. Like I said, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoothies are good but.......
customer_reviews.text: This blender is okay. I guess I expected a lot more. It bounces all around so I have to hold on to it to make a smoothie. The pulse button will not stay down, I have to keep pressing it to make it work. It does make great smoothies I just can let go of the blender while it is on. The company has discounted me for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Mslori757

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The engine spins without turning the blades. The soup/pulse button is useless. The whole thing is bulkier and looks much unrefined than in the picture. This is probably the worse household product I ever owned. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Burebista Valahorum

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, my favorite appliance
customer_reviews.text: I love my blender. I use this every day. I do wish it had a better recipe book, but that’s it. I would buy this again. Blends veggies into juice with ease. I haven’t found a soup recipe that I have liked but the soup switch works awesome too. It’s nice that I can have a blender like a Vitamix without the Vitamix price. It is on the larger side but for me that is not an issue. The bottle that comes with it is made of a thick plastic and is durable but the spout is not my favorite. Totally recommend this blender. I will probably continue to buy Cosori products because of this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different brand that you can get replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I was mostly happy with this blender. It doesn't crush up frozen drinks without a lot of assistance which is our primary use but it was okay for the price point. The issue I want to make buyers aware of is that they don't have replacement parts. My blender jar was damaged last week and after not finding replacements online I contacted the manufacturer about buying one through them and was told that unless it was a warranty issue they don't have replacement parts and would not sell me a replacement. So now I have a useless motor base and have to find a whole new blender... it definitely won't be a Cosori.
customer_reviews.author: Figment

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and makes great smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful blender. A solid connection between the container and the base. Should last a long time. Only complaint is the amount of noise that this blender makes. Easy to clean. Makes great smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Rafe

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. Does 1 action
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yes... Say hello to mixology! ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. Does 1 action, but what's the way! Very powerful. Piña colada, frozen margaritas, milkshakes - beautiful product! Update 2020.09.18. Not any more :) I think it's over. Not sure if 2 years is considered is a term to serve. Used 1-2 times per months with session of 5 mins max I think
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender. I love it. Just as good as the Vitamix but affordable. It stopped working but with the tip/help from Etekcity Support I got it started again. There is a reset button on the bottom of the power base so if it stops on you just unplug it, take the blender container off, make sure the buttons/knobs are at off/stop, and the soup/pulse button is in neutral then turn the power base upside down and press the reset button. I'll bet that fixes it for you. If you are looking for the best blender buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the metal gear, something that is not found in most blenders in this class. However everything else felt cheaply made. The blender seating was very unsturdy and concerning too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It is a dream machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many blenders over the years and some very high priced and to me this is the best one I have ever owned! It does not overheat. It does exactly what the manufacturer says it will do! I am recommending it to all my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit too tall, but perfect in every other way!
customer_reviews.text: This blender makes the SMOOTHEST smoothies I’ve ever had. And it’s the quietest blender I’ve ever owned. I still haven’t used the soup function, but overall I’m very pleased with this purchase. The unit is taller than my cupboards, but I just leave the lid off the blender and it fits on the counter fine that way.
customer_reviews.author: S. Teal

customer_reviews.title: There is poor connection between container and connection
customer_reviews.text: The blender doesn't work. I waited too long to return blender. The window is closed. The blender makes a beep when turned on. Nothing happens. There is poor connection between container and connection.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Blender fails and starts smoking in a year and a half.
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think that a blender of this quality would have a motor that starts to smoke and fail in just 1 year and a half! Guess what? Only used it about 12 times to make smoothies and last night I heard the motor wind down and I could smell smoke. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Herman

customer_reviews.title: CORSORI 1500watts - Did Not Disappoint And So Happy!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH! If you want a smooth drink, no chunky bits like (Ninja) CORSORI 1500watts is your Best Buy & money well spent. Recommend by my supervisor, thanks Sharon. Brought for the office so everyone can enjoy this amazing machine. Not Disappointed & So Happy!
customer_reviews.author: F. D’ABreau

customer_reviews.title: Better than a $$$Vitamix!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this blender. The pitcher is large and so easy to clean. It does fast work of blending up a delicious smoothie with kale, berries, nut milk and yogurt. This blender makes smooth, delicious smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Cullinan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, and great at blending the tough stuff
customer_reviews.text: This guy is no joke. Very sturdy, and great at blending the tough stuff. Only used it a few times, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It lasts maybe 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender since October 2017, I love it it does a great job. Sad to say it started to leak. My husband took it apart and the container is cracked. I have used this solely for blending drinks so I would not think this would cause a crack. I can't seem to find replacement parts. The price has dropped in half since I purchased this blender. I paid $200 and you can get them for now for $90. So figure 2 years of use !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect results
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I use it for smoothies and raw threats. (I have it since a month). Tough you can not detache the blade because if you do it you will loose your waranty/guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I Love, Love this blender! For so long I wanted a vitamix, but it was so expensive! I had a ninja and it did not blend my veggies and Nuts! I decided to give this a try and it has been amazing....! It’s still going strong after 1.5 years and I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used it for four days then the motor started smoking and now it barely runs. Bought a ninja and you can put anything in that and it blends without a problem. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rebuck

customer_reviews.title: Blends spinach to liquid but too noisy!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box 3 days ago and have made 3 protein smoothies. Too noisy!!!! My word. Also, I wonder about durability since the smell is quite electrical every time I use it to make my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: brian rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she has loved it. She had recently had some teeth pulled and couldn’t eat solid food so she has mostly used it to make smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi 43

customer_reviews.title: WOW, You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this full-power appliance. It does everything the description says it does. How often do you find that?
customer_reviews.author: Tim  Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I saw a demo for Blendtec at Costco, and then did a little research before choosing the Cosori. I have never had a Vitamix, but this is so powerful it really makes awesome smoothies. It does not have to blend for very long and my kale or blueberries are totally mingled. I never heard of Cosori before. They make a hot pot too. Hmmmm?
customer_reviews.author: andrea morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Takes some getting used to using it. Impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Worst item on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst item we bought from Amazon. It works sometimes but most of time it doesn't work. I should've opened the box earlier to find out cuz it's out of return period. I really want my money back! NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality blender.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty blender. Easy to clean and powerful. I've been doing smoothies and soups from this blender and it hasn't failed me. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Miko

customer_reviews.title: OMG! This blender is just as good if not better than the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.text: What a steal. I LOVE this blender, I use to have Vitamin, this is better and so much cheaper. Same quality by the way. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: ostiadel

customer_reviews.title: Two didn't operate
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one, would not work, Amazon replaced and second one would not function.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Moses

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This blender does it all. Frozen drinks for parties, sauces, soup, and smoothies. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blender does everything we expected it to do. We bought it to make smoothies with. We didn't want the popular smoothie makers as they are limited in what they can do. This one is powerful and and relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Great for Smoothies. Easy to use and clean. Seems to have good power.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's powerful enough to blend the frozen fruit and ice easily. I REALLY like the plunger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for making smoothies. It's powerful enough to blend the frozen fruit and ice easily. I REALLY like the plunger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like very much
customer_reviews.text: Like very much, well pleased. I wish the 32 ounce container was sold separate. I would love to have another one
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Big and Blends
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly large, larger than I thought but blends quickly and well. The base and motor construction are very nice. Altogether, much better than the Kitchen Aid blender it relaplaced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marchione

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. Easy to use. This product is perfect for emulsifying ingredients used in juicing. Be careful not to overload.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My family loves to make healthy smoothies
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My family loves to make healthy smoothies. The reviews for this were good but I had my doubts. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Burned up like 5th time using it then quit working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender to make fruit smoothies. It is somewhat hard to operate. The right button must be pushed up first while the middle knob is on zero. Then the speed knob can be turned up. This is every time or it doesn't work. Very cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Vibe 1961

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Beware this blender lasted 5 months and died! We used it about 20 times. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blends smoothies more completely than any other blender I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Spottamus

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: The Cosori 1500W model is a great blender. It blends / grinds up ice cubes into evenly small pieces for my daily shakes. It does it better than any other blender I’ve owned or tried in the past. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chuck H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Was a gift for my girls and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: glad we tried it
customer_reviews.text: Killer blender especially considering the price difference, glad we tried it. This blender works so good it could probably turn a cinder block to dust.
customer_reviews.author: jessica misora

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best people to get an itemfrom if there happen to be probems or not. The blender is great.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I love having a large container to make ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love having a large container to make my smoothies for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: KSTrini

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this blender.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blender for only a couple of days and am in love with it. I was skeptical about the blender when I was buying it but was worth buying. Very powerful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jemima Acquah Klo

customer_reviews.title: I liked it while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great blender until it died. I bought it in January of 2018 and by the summer of 2019 it was dead. I used it mostly to make smoothies. I contacted the company, but because I sent in the registration instead of doing it online and could not find the record they were not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Farn

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love the closed bottom
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great! Love the closed bottom. No leaks. It grinds everything, including beets! Yum!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for price
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Works like it is advertised.. Been using for few months, no problems, handles anything you can blend, easy to use, quality containers to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it. has replaced her Ninja blender and she says makes better smoothies than the Ninja. virtually no pulp/graininess to the smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchStuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smoothies and frozen cocktails!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! this blender! I wanted something that would make smoothies like I can buy in stores and this one definitely does. The secret is the 1500 watt motor that gives it the necessary power to blend fresh and frozen fruits and vegetables in just a few seconds! I highly recommend this blender, it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than competitors Blends well everything I've put in it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Accustomed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Half the price of the vitamix yet as good! I use mainly for smoothies which does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! My mother owns a ninja a friend has a vitamix.....this Cosori really blows them away
customer_reviews.author: JESUS BEN

customer_reviews.title: Worst Blender
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Barely used it. Never had any power and after 3-4 uses wouldn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, blends frozen fruit with no chunks left ...
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, blends frozen fruit with no chunks left behind. The blender does a great jog pulverizing. The settings are actually different and they work well. I usually don't write reviews but I had to give all due praises !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toast after 3 uses.  Boooo.
customer_reviews.text: Made 2 batches of smoothies - did fine. 3rd use: dead. Really, really disappointed. Tough to waste that kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Ed

customer_reviews.title: This blender is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is AMAZING!!! Wanted a Vitamix type product but not spend over $500---I have made smoothies and soups already and love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. It’s sturdy and does a great job. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mania Jabes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sometimes there is a “burning” smell coming from motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good it's been a couple of weeks and everything is blending well!
customer_reviews.author: DDKS2

customer_reviews.title: Like it for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted a new blender that didn’t get hung up trying to blend smoothies. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: UpNorthMariska

customer_reviews.title: Burned out!!!
customer_reviews.text: The motor burned out while making a smoothie. Didnt even last 6 months. Looks heavy duty but it wasn't. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working mid blend. Anyone else have that problem.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after first use. Only rated because they made me.
customer_reviews.author: Quita

customer_reviews.title: If it's a gift beware
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my wife that was shipped in the original box. No point in wrapping it I guess. Thanks for taking the fun out of Christmas. Haven't taken it out to see if anything is broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gabers

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great product, we have used it daily to make ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product, we have used it daily to make smoothies...it blends all fruit out smoothly. Would definitely bup it again
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: works as it should or as the same as the ...
customer_reviews.text: works as it should or as the same as the high price blenders that are on the market. Same yourself some money and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: loose canon

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for smoothies and priced very well. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: The Cosori blender is great for blending frozen fruit into smoothies. It is very large so you have store in pantry or other than the countertops. Other than that we are pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Much quieter than the Nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite blender in the world. It's much quieter than the Nutribullet blender. I love how it has similar features comparing to the Vitamix blender and it's great to make soups and other things.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela Alyse

customer_reviews.title: It's work great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender because I wanted something that has more capacity for motor and jar size. It blend smoothie in few minutes, great for grinding soak grains too, I use all the time for Dosa/Idli batter. Base is pretty durable. It does all work that I wanted. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Nilesh Panchal

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase other popular brand but I didn't want to spend too much for the blender. I am glad that I did. This blender is greater for smoothies at affordable price. I am using it everyday and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The blending of the fruits and veggies as if I purchased the smoothies from a smoothie shop.
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast it made my smoothies. It really blended the fruits and vegetables. This blender is great for smoothies soups. It was so easy to clean,
customer_reviews.author: L.Y

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, pain to use
customer_reviews.text: Worst blender I have had. You have to fiddle with buttons to get it to work. It's a pain and so bulky. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after first use!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after first use. Horrible experience! The fact they reduced price doesn't helps a lot. This product is just worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Milan D.

customer_reviews.title: Functions as advertised
customer_reviews.text: --updated-- 12/31/17 Unit malfunctioned during first use. In addition, I was unable to submit my proof of purchase to get the additional year warranty, as their email system kicked my submission back stating it was identified as spam. To top it off, when making an attempt to contact customer support during their stated business hours, I was connected to the voicemail that states the business hours and asking called to call back during business hours. Erm... -- update: was able to arrange exchange, was sent new unit. So far new unit performs as advertised. Quiet and powerful. Was also able to submit receipt to get additional year of extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy & Amy Champoux

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.  Built to look like the ones that last.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 5 months. I did not use it regularly. I don't have it but get the warranty. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great initially, but will let you down!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year and a half now and it's crapping out. Takes so much effort to make a smoothie. You get what you pay for I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Human Being

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but has a hard time blending everything evenly, or without over heating.
customer_reviews.author: NatalievZ

customer_reviews.title: so much more efficient and faster than our older different ...
customer_reviews.text: so much more efficient and faster than our older different brand. It takes much less time to make smoothies than on the older machine we had. The contents of the smoothie are consistant, no solid pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: COSORI Blender 1500W for Shakes Professional Heavy Duty Smoothie Maker With Variable Speeds, with 800W Auto-Blend Base for Ice Fruits & Nutrients Extraction, 2 x 24oz cups, 1 x 12oz cup
product_meta.description: More than a blender no culinary task is too small or too Large for the COSORI Pro-class blender. Its powerful 1500W motor chops, dices, and purees different types of food to your desired consistency while extracting all of the nutrition to keep you healthy. The blender can heat up your food by revving up to a speed of 30, 000 rpm, delivering warm soups within minutes for the family to enjoy. You will discover that this blender will serve multiple functions in the kitchen and prove itself to be more than just a blender; use it as a food processor, ice Crusher, Coffee grinder, whole food juicer, and more! Safety and support the ul-certified motor base comes with a wide array of safety features to ensure hazard-free operation including automatic overload protection, overheat protection, and a pitcher sensor that prevents the motor from running if the pitcher is not properly on the base. Both the 64-ounce pitcher and 27-ounce container are crafted from BPA-free materials and are dishwasher safe for easy clean-up. The best part? All parts of the blender come with a one-year and lifetime product support from COSORI. Try this. . . And that! Our included recipe book is sure to give you that creative spark when using your new blender. From frozen margaritas on warm summer days, to savory chimichurri paste for your steak, and even hot soups for the colder months, you will find that this blender can help you do it all.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY - The 1500-watt advanced motor system is designed to the toughest ingredients, with high performance for making green smoothies, milkshakes, crushing ice , nut butters and more. It is last and safety with automatically shut off when overheating and over-load

SIX HARDENDED STAINLESS STEEL BLADE - 6 premium razor-sharp blade assembly thoroughly breaks down ingredients, fruits, vegetables & seeds for nutrient & vitamin extraction, gives you the most easily absorbed food

VARIABLE SPEED CONTROL - Easily adjust speed to achieve a variety of needs. The soft knob can be rotated at any point during the blend, so you’re in complete control, with pulse feature & soup function to make your life tastefully
BPA FREE CONTAINERS - 70oz family-size pitcher with an extra 27oz personal Travel Bottle(with To-Go Lids). Not only perfect for a family, but also allows you to take nutrient on the go

SELF CLEANING - Easily clean your pitcher through running the blender with some warm water and dish soap after you are done with your recipe. An extra bonus cleaning brush included, all accessories are dishwasher safe
Included Components: Recipe Manual Tamper Travel Bottlle
